QuestData.Title: Shadow Vault Decree
QuestData.Description: Thane Ufrang the Mighty sits within his hall overlooking the Savage Ledge. I've studied him. The thane is a patient vrykul, with a head for strategy and warfare. He's also shown a penchant for biding his time and not wanting to overplay his hand in the ongoing battle.$B$BI need him dead!$B$BI've written a decree. Stand before the thane and read it aloud.$B$B<The duke arches his eyebrow in amusement.>$B$BIt should... unnerve him at the least.
QuestData.LogDescription: Duke Lankral at The Shadow Vault has ordered you to read the Shadow Vault Decree in the presence of Thane Ufrang the Mighty, and then to slay him.
QuestData.CompletionText: My scouts inform me that Ufrang yet lives.$B$BDo you not know how to read, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: <Duke Lankral nods his approval at your report of success.>$B$BWe face a foe that dwarfs us, not only in stature, but also numerically. If we are to win the battle for Icecrown, we must outthink them!$B$BWith Ufrang dead, that gives us an advantage in Jotunheim. Let us see if we can capitalize on it.
